description.ko: 네온의 빛이 결코 사라지지 않는 거대한 하이테크 도시의 숨막히는 전경으로, 거칠면서도 활기찬 미래 문명의 본질을 담아냈습니다.
description.en: A breathtaking view of a sprawling high-tech city where the glow of neon never fades, capturing the essence of a gritty yet vibrant futuristic civilization.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a futuristic cyberpunk city at night, vibrant neon signs in electric blue and hot pink reflecting on rain-slicked asphalt, towering megastructures with holographic advertisements, flying vehicles soaring between skyscrapers, dense atmosphere with volumetric fog and steam, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, intricate cybernetic details.
